description: Replacement roof to dwellinghouse and garage; two rear dormers.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal" style="">Development shall not commence beyond the limited preparation and demolition works required until samples of all handmade clay roof tiles types to be used in the construction of the dormers and reroofing have been demonstrated to the local planning authority's satisfaction and approved in writing. The development shall be completed in accordance with the approved details and shall thereafter be retained.</p>
The materials, detailling and finishes to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:<br></p><p>Site Location Plan; Site Plan; P101 - Existing Ground Floor and First Floor Plans ;P102 - Existing 2nd floor and Roof Plans; P103 - Existing Front and Rear Elevations ; P104 - Existing East and West [Side] Elevations; P105 – Proposed 2nd floor and Roof Plans; P106– Proposed Front and Rear Elevations; P107– Proposed East and West [Side] Elevations; P108 – Garage Plans and Elevations; Heritage Statement; ASW/SW/062/28/2024 – Preliminary Bat Roost Assessment by ASW Ecology Ltd (received 11.07.24 &amp; dated July 2024); ASW/SW/108/28/2024 – Bat Emergence Survey by ASW Ecology Ltd (received 26.09.24 &amp; dated Sept 2024)</p><p>All documents received 05.12.23 unless otherwise stated&nbsp;</p><p>Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.</p><div><br></div>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
